deleted.description: The current deleted state of the role.

description.description: A human-readable description for the role.

name.description: The name of the role in the format projects/{{project}}/roles/{{role_id}}. Like id, this field can be used as a reference in other resources such as IAM role bindings.

permissions.description: The names of the permissions this role grants when bound in an IAM policy. At least one permission must be specified.

project.description: The project that the service account will be created in. Defaults to the provider project configuration.

role_id.description: The camel case role id to use for this role. Cannot contain - characters.

stage.description: The current launch stage of the role. Defaults to GA.

title.description: A human-readable title for the role.
